text: Chadwick William "Chad" Morgan OAM (11 February 1933 - 1 January 2025) was an Australian country music singer and guitarist. He was known for his vaudeville style of songs. He is known as "The Sheik of Scrubby Creek". He was in the movies Newsfront (1978), Dimboola (1979), and the biographical documentary I'm Not Dead Yet (2011). He retired in April 2024. Morgan died on 1 January 2025 at a hospital in Gin Gin, Queensland at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Australian country musicians Category:Musicians from Queensland Category:Australian singers Category:Australian guitarists
title: Chad Morgan
